explains: n. （影视剧中的）配角；刻有浮雕的宝石或贝壳；小品文
wordGroup: cameo appearance [俚]友情客串（名演员饰演小角色）
cameo role n. 衬托明星演员的小配角

sentences.en: Each was rewarded for his efforts with a cameo.
sentences.cn: 作为对他努力的回报，各自在影片中客串配角。

sentences.en: Schwarzenegger confirmed he would be making a cameo appearance in The Expendables.
sentences.cn: 施瓦辛格确认他将会在《敢死队》中客串演出。

sentences.en: In June he made a cameo appearance in a comic tribute, "Rod Blagojevich Superstar".
sentences.cn: 六月他还在喜剧《巨星罗德·布拉戈耶维奇》中友情客串。
